titleStmt.title: An exposition of the Symbole of the Apostles, or rather of the articles of faith In which the chiefe points of the euerlasting and free couenant betweene God and the faithfull is briefly and plainly handled. Gathered out of the catechising sermons of Gasper Oleuvian Treuir, and now translated out of the Latine tongue into the English for the benefite of Christ his Church. By Iohn Fielde.
titleStmt.author: Olevian, Caspar, 1536-1587.
Fielde, John, d. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Middleton, for Thomas Man, and Tobie Smith,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Gasper Oleuian vpon the Creede.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
